item.title: InmateBridge: Voice Bridge for Prank Calling
item.description: I don’t know what it tells about me, but I have a soft spot for prank calls. My guilty pleasure is listening to the prank call show Phone Losers of America. In the show, the host Brad calls up unsuspecting people with bizarre stories to get a reaction out of them. He’s done it for decades, which you can tell from his ability of giving his victims a hard time on the phone while remaining totally cool himself.
